commandDescription: Deploys an ADK-based demo to a non-scratch (ie. trial, DE, or sandbox) org
configfileFlagDescription: Overrides the 'demoConfig' setting from sfdx-project.json in the ADK project
deploydirFlagDescription: Path to a directory that contains a fully-configured ADK project
falcondebugFlagDescription: (hidden) runs this command in debug mode
falcondebugasyncFlagDescription: (hidden) runs this command in async debug mode
falcondebugextendedFlagDescription: (hidden) runs this command in extended debug mode
